card.text: {B}, Exile a card from a graveyard: Empty Husk gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.text: Unequal Twins enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Unequal Twins: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.text: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Durable Host. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: XSK Draft Archetypes XSK
card.text: {W}{U} ENHANCEMENT Target your own creatures to create the perfect specimen. {U}{B} MILL The mind is a wonderful thing to waste. {B}{R} COUNTERS Experiment on your victims with additional counters. {R}{G} SACRIFICE Science demands a heavy price sometimes. Let others pay it. {G}{W} IMPLANT Graft strange new abilities onto your creatures. {W}{B} GRAVEYARD Not all specimens survive. But all of them serve a purpose. {B}{G} EMERGE Use creatures to fuel bigger monsters as the game goes on. {G}{U} SPECIATION Embrace variety and be rewarded for multiple creature types. {U}{R} MUTANTS Born or created, gather your mutant coterie and thrive. {R}{W} SPELLS Some subjects respond well to stimulus. Cast spells and find out.

card.name: Rupture Fiend
card.text: Rupture Fiend enters the battlefield with either a +1/+1 counter or a menace counter on it chosen at random.

card.name: Puncture Fiend
card.text: Puncture Fiend enters the battlefield with either a +1/+1 counter or a haste counter on it chosen at random.

card.name: Skinless Seer
card.text: Emerge {4}{G}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.) When Skinless Seer enters the battlefield, if it emerged, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Skittering Predator
card.text: Trample {3}{G}{G}: Diverge 5/5 (If this creature isn't a Mutant, its base power and toughness become 5/5 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Fungal Growth
card.text: You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped. Implant {1}{G} (As you cast a creature spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its implant cost. If you do, that spell gains "When this creature enters the battlefield" and this card's effects.)

card.name: Ardent Experimenter
card.text: Ardent Experimenter enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it as long as a player has seven or more cards in their graveyard.

card.name: Hapless Hybrid
card.text: Flying Whenever Hapless Hybrid becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, target player mills two cards.

card.name: Twisted Shambler
card.text: Twisted Shambler has trample as long as it has a counter on it. {1}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Twisted Shambler.

card.name: Fruiting Body
card.text: {1}{G}, Sacrifice Fruiting Body: Return target non-Fungus creature card or card with implant from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Xylosynthetic Husk
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice Xylosynthetic Husk, create a 1/1 colorless Survivor creature token.

card.name: Infected Insurrectionist
card.text: When Infected Insurrectionist enters the battlefield, return an instant or sorcery card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Prison Break
card.text: As long there are seven or more cards in your graveyard, you may cast this spell as though it had flash. Create two 1/1 colorless Survivor creature tokens.

card.name: Moxilus Hulk
card.text: Flash {4}{U}: Diverge 3/6 (If this creature isn't a Mutant, its base power and toughness become 3/6 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Reconstitute
card.text: Target player mills three cards, then you return up to two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Specimen Capture
card.text: Exile target creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Recycled Upgrade
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance. You may cast this spell from your graveyard by exiling two other cards from your graveyard in addition to paying its other costs.

card.name: Escaped Experiment
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, reveal a noncreature, nonland card from your hand or pay {3}.

card.name: Proof of Concept
card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Proof of Concept gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If that spell targets Proof of Concept, instead put a +1/+1 counter on Proof of Concept.

card.name: Screaming Rebirth
card.text: Return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand. Implant {1}{W} (As you cast a creature spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its implant cost. If you do, that spell gains "When this creature enters the battlefield" and this card's effects.)

card.name: Expendable Captive
card.text: If Expendable Captive is sacrificed to pay for a creature spell's emerge cost, that creature enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Larval Hybrid
card.text: Larval Hybrid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Larval Hybrid: Target player mills three cards.

card.name: Sinewed Evangel
card.text: Emerge {5}{B} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.) When Sinewed Evangel enters the battlefield, if it emerged, target player mills two cards and loses 2 life.

card.name: Mind Flense
card.text: Target player reveals X cards from their hand, where X is 1 plus the number of card types among cards in all graveyards. You choose one of those cards. That player discards that card.

card.name: Serum Injection
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature becomes a 4/4 blue Human Jellyfish Mutant and gains hexproof.

card.name: Synaptic Tampering
card.text: Choose one. If you control a creature with three or more creature types as you cast this spell, you may choose both. • Draw two cards, then discard a card. • Target player mills five cards.

card.name: Hyperstasis
card.text: Target opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until three creature cards are revealed. That player puts all cards revealed this way into their graveyard.

card.name: Careless Researcher
card.text: {3}{B}{B}: Diverge 5/5 (If this creature isn't a Mutant, its base power and toughness become 5/5 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Diverge XSK
card.text: You can mark a creature that has diverged with this reminder card

card.name: Hydroponic Spurt
card.text: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. When you do, create a 1/1 green Fungus Insect Mutant creature token. Implant {G} (As you cast a creature spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its implant cost. If you do, that spell gains "When this creature enters the battlefield" and this card's effects.)

card.name: Mycoid Progenitor
card.text: Emerge {6}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)

card.name: Allele Grafter
card.text: When Allele Grafter enters the battlefield, return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If that creature had three or more creature types, put a +1/+1 counter on Allele Grafter.

card.name: Autopsy
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Grim Parazoan
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Grim Parazoan.

card.name: Voracious Specimen
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Voracious Specimen deals 2 damage to each opponent. If the sacrificed creature was a Mutant, Voracious Specimen deals 3 damage to each opponent instead.

card.name: Curiosity Gallery
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell with at least one creature type not found among creatures you control.

card.name: Surgeon's Slab
card.text: When Surgeon's Slab enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life. {T}: Add {C}.

card.name: Show of Strength
card.text: Choose target creature you control and target creature you don't control. The creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each counter on it. Then those creatures fight each other.

card.name: Sightless Shambler
card.text: {3}{U}{U}: Diverge 4/4 (If this creature isn't a Mutant, its base power and toughness become 4/4 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.) When Sightless Shambler diverges, exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Copy that card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Savage Extraction
card.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that permanent and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

card.name: Telomere Charger
card.text: {X}{R}: Diverge 1/1 (If this creature isn't a Mutant, its base power and toughness become 1/1 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.) When Telomere Charger diverges, it gets +X/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Aleph, Mutant Primus
card.text: If a permanent you control being put into a graveyard from the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

card.name: Emergency Countdown
card.text: Choose a creature type from among creatures on the battlefield. Each player who controls a creature of the chosen type draws a card. Then destroy all creatures.

card.name: Sonorous Cetacean
card.text: Flying Whenever Sonorous Cetacean becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, you may return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Experimental Overseer
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under you control, if it emerged and if Experimental Overseer wasn't sacrificed to pay its emerge cost, you may return Experimental Overseer from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Eruption of Flesh
card.text: For each creature you control, choose one of its creature types not already chosen. Eruption of Flesh deals damage to any target equal to the number of types chosen this way.

card.name: Alpha's Awakening
card.text: If one or more counters would be put on a creature or planeswalker you control, that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters are put on that permanent instead.

card.name: Aspect of Exaptation
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creatures you control. {3}{W}: Return Aspect of Exaptation from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you control three or more creatures.

card.name: Security Failsafe
card.text: Each opponent mills cards until that player has milled a creature card, a land card, and a noncreature, nonland card. Implant {3}{U}{U} (As you cast a creature spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its implant cost. If you do, that spell gains "When this creature enters the battlefield" and this card's effects.)

card.name: Ren's Grand Design
card.text: Look at the top seven cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. You may look at and cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.

card.name: Fossil Record
card.text: Fossil Record costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control with three or more creature types. Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Sterile Conditions
card.text: Return target nonland permanent card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Implant {W}{W} (As you cast a creature spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its implant cost. If you do, that spell gains "When this creature enters the battlefield" and this card's effects.)

card.name: Self-Experimenter
card.text: {2}{U}{U}: Diverge 1/1 (If this creature isn't a Mutant, its base power and toughness become 1/1 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.) You may look at the top card of your library any time. You may cast spells from the top of your library as long as Self-Experimenter is a Mutant.

card.name: Field Analyst
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature you control. Creatures you control with counters on them have haste.

card.name: Anabolic Infusion
card.text: Double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn. Implant {2}{G}{G}{G}{G} (As you cast a creature spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its implant cost. If you do, that spell gains "When this creature enters the battlefield" and this card's effects.)

card.name: Hashua, Security Chief
card.text: As long as Hashua, Security Chief is untapped, players can't cast noncreature spells with mana value greater than the number of lands you control.

card.name: Amniotic Chamber
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this is the third time this ability has triggered this turn, creatures you control gain haste and vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Subject Selection
card.text: Create X 1/1 colorless Survivor creature tokens. Implant {X}{G}{W} (As you cast a creature spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its implant cost. If you do, that spell gains "When this creature enters the battlefield" and this card's effects.)

card.name: Ethical Violation
card.text: Emerge {4}{B}{G} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.) When Ethical Violation enters the battlefield, if it emerged, destroy target permanent.

card.name: Brutal Fusion
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Trample, haste Brutal Fusion's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

card.name: Project Gamal-III
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose up to three creature types. Project Gamal-III is the chosen types until the beginning of your next upkeep. Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each of their creatures types, to a maximum of +3/+3.

card.name: Medical Torture
card.text: For each creature you control, choose one of its creature types not already chosen. Target opponent loses life equal to the number of types chosen this way.

card.name: Scientific Method
card.text: Exile the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand. You may cast a spell from the remaining pile without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Devourer of Flesh
card.text: Emerge {6}{B}{B} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.) When Devourer of Flesh enters the battlefield, if it emerged, each player loses half their life, rounded up.

card.name: Hyperevolution
card.text: Destroy target nonenchantment permanent an opponent controls. Its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a permanent card that shares a card type with that permanent. They put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of their library in a random order. Implant {2}{R}

card.name: Persistent Sporecap
card.text: Implant costs you pay cost {1} less. When Persistent Sporecap dies, you may exile it. If you do, return up to two target cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Growth-Vat Subject
card.text: Double strike Whenever Growth-Vat Subject becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, you may pay {X}, where X is the number of counters on Growth-Vat Subject. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Growth-Vat Subject.

card.name: Secrets of Biology
card.text: Scry X, where X is the number of creatures you control that have three or more creature types, then draw three cards.

card.name: Stunted Runt
card.text: If Stunted Runt is sacrificed to pay for a creature spell's emerge cost, you may pay 2 life. If you do, target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Cephalic Monstrosity
card.text: Whenever Cephalic Monstrosity attacks, you may sacrifice a Mutant. If you do, Cephalic Monstrosity deals damage equal to that Mutant's power to target player or planeswalker.

card.name: Orthogenesis
card.text: Whenever a creature you control enters the battlefield or diverges, note one of its creature types that hasn't been noted for Orthogenesis. At the beginning of your upkeep, if eight or more types have been noted for Orthogenesis, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. Then if fifteen or more types have been noted for Orthogenesis, you win the game.

card.name: Perfected Weapon
card.text: Flying Whenever Perfected Weapon deals combat damage to a player, each player loses life equal to the number of counters on it, then put a +1/+1 on Perfected Weapon.

card.name: Taxidermied Hellkite
card.text: Flying {R}: Taxidermied Hellkite gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {2}{R}: Mutants you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Advanced Genomics
card.text: As Advanced Genomics enters the battlefield, choose two creature types. Creatures you control get +1/+1 for each of the chosen types they are.

card.name: Sensory Perception
card.text: For each creature you control, choose one of its creature types not already chosen. Search your library for a card with mana value less than or equal to the number of types chosen this way, reveal it, put into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Lives Unlived
card.text: Search your library for up to four creature cards with different names and reveal them. An opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle.

card.name: Wandering Ganglia
card.text: Emerge {X}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.) When Wandering Ganglia enters the battlefield, if it emerged, exile the top X cards of your library. You may play those cards until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Decontamination Unit
card.text: Decontamination Unit gets +2/+2 as long as you control three or more differently named Laboratories. {3}, {T}, Sacrifice a land: Search your library for a basic land card or Laboratory card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Dimensional Tank
card.text: Dimensional Tank enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {U} or {B}. When Dimensional Tank is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.

card.name: Observation Deck
card.text: Observation Deck enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {W} or {U}. When Observation Deck is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Abandoned Terrarium
card.text: Abandoned Terrarium enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. When Abandoned Terrarium is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Stasis Cells
card.text: Stasis Cells enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {G}. When Stasis Cells is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Fluid Refinery
card.text: Fluid Refinery enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. When Fluid Refinery is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Spliced Seraph
card.text: Flying When Spliced Seraph enters the battlefield, exile target creature and target creature card in a graveyard. Return the exiled cards to the battlefield under their owners' control when Spliced Seraph leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Fused Amalgam
card.text: When Fused Amalgam dies, create three 3/3 green Human Horror creature tokens. They have "When this creature dies, create three 1/1 green Human Splinter creature tokens."

card.name: Human Horror XSK
card.text: When this creature dies, create three 1/1 green Human Splinter creature tokens.

card.name: Preservation Jar
card.text: As Preservation Jar enters the battlefield, choose a creature card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities. Permanents with the chosen name can't attack or block.

card.name: Hazard Suit
Rusted Needle
Kuth Von, Hypergeneticist
card.text: Other creatures you control have "{X}{UR}: Diverge X/X." (If that creature isn't a Mutant, its base power and toughness become X/X and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Project Halcyon
card.text: {GU}, {T}, Sacrifice a token: Search your library for a creature card with combined power and toughness equal to 1 plus the sacrificed token's combined power and toughness, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Ukarth Ren, Vivisector
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a nontoken creature, you may exile it. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature, except it's 2/2.

card.name: Vitho Baun, Artisan of Flesh
card.text: {W}{U}, {T}: Choose target creature, then choose one — • Until end of turn, that creature assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power. • Exile that creature, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Sush Kur, Sporebreeder
card.text: When Sush Kur, Sporebreeder enters the battlefield, put a spore counter on each other creature you control. {R}{G}, Sacrifice a creature with a spore counter on it: Create X 1/1 green Fungus Insect Mutant creature tokens, where X is the sacrificed creature's power. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Transhumanism
card.text: When Transhumanism enters the battlefield, each player may put a +1/+1 counter on up to one creature. Each creature can't attack unless its power or toughness is higher than its base power or toughness.

card.name: Stolen Spark
card.text: Enchant creature or planeswalker When Stolen Spark enters the battlefield, if enchanted permanent isn't a planeswalker, put three loyalty counters on it and it becomes a legendary planeswalker with "[+1]: Scry 1." and "[-3]: Draw a card." (It's no longer a creature.)

card.name: More Human Than Human
card.text: Put all Human cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Warp Vision
card.text: Exile your graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among the exiled cards. When you cast a spell this way, it deals damage to you equal to the number of spells you've cast this turn.

card.name: War Nerve
card.text: Double the power of each of up to X target creatures until end of turn. If seven or more green mana was spent to cast this spell, those creatures gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: It From Beyond
card.text: When It From Beyond enters the battlefield, exile all cards from graveyards. Spells you cast cost {W} less to cast if you own a white card in exile. The same is true for {U} and blue, {B} and black, {R} and red, and {G} and green.

card.name: Emergence Beacon
card.text: {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Choose target card in your graveyard. You may cast that card this turn if its mana value is less than or equal to the exiled card's.

card.name: Udim, Human Plus
card.text: As Udim, Human Plus enters the battlefield, you may pay any amount of life. Udim, Human Plus enters the battlefield tapped with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the life paid.

card.name: Nemesis, Imperfect Form
card.text: Whenever a source you control deals damage to an opponent, put a +1/+1 counter on Nemesis, Imperfect Form. Remove three +1/+1 counters from Nemesis: Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. Instant and sorcery spells you cast this way have lifelink.

card.name: Specimen Alpha
card.text: {2}{U}{R}: Diverge 3/12 or 9/3 (If this creature isn't a Mutant, its base power and toughness become your choice of 3/12 or 9/3 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.) When Specimen Alpha diverges, discard your hand and draw three cards.
